text: Robert E. Walkup (November 14, 1936 â€“ March 12, 2021) was an American Republican politician. He was the 40th Mayor of Tucson from 1999 to 2011. Walkup died on March 12, 2021, at his home in Tucson from idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis, aged 84. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American mayors Category:Politicians from Iowa Category:Politicians from Tucson, Arizona Category:Republican Party (United States) politicians Category:Deaths from idiopathic pulmonary fibrosis
title: Bob Walkup
